tool.name: Check headers
tool.description: of any set of flowtext files
tool.help:
This tool returns a table of the headers of a set of text files.
-----
**Input files**
This tool requires collections of txt, flowtext or tabular files as input.
**Output file**
The output file is a table listing the headers for each file.
-----
**Example**
*File1*::
Marker1 Marker2 Marker3 34 45 12 33 65 10
*File2*::
Marker4 Marker5 Marker3 19 62 98 12 36 58
*Output*::
Index 1 2 3 File1 Marker1 Marker2 Marker3 File2 Marker4 Marker5 Marker3
